dt: {bc}to seek to attain or accomplish a particular goal

dt.t: She {it}aspired{/it} to a career in medicine.

et: Middle English, from Middle French or Latin; Middle French {it}aspirer{/it}, from Latin {it}aspirare{/it}, literally, to breathe upon, from {it}ad-{/it} + {it}spirare{/it} to breathe
shortdef: to seek to attain or accomplish a particular goal
